item1.question: What is Flux AI Prompt Generator?
item1.answer: Flux AI Prompt Generator is an innovative tool designed to help users create engaging and effective prompts for various applications, including writing, marketing, and content creation. By leveraging advanced AI algorithms, it generates suggestions that stimulate creativity and improve productivity.

item2.question: How does Flux AI work?
item2.answer: Flux AI utilizes artificial intelligence and machine learning techniques to analyze user inputs and generate relevant prompts. Users can customize parameters to tailor the output, ensuring that the generated prompts meet their specific needs, whether for personal projects or professional tasks.

item3.question: Who can benefit from using Flux AI?
item3.answer: Flux AI is ideal for writers, marketers, educators, and content creators looking for inspiration and guidance. It can help users break through writer's block, develop marketing strategies, or create lesson plans, making it a valuable tool for anyone in need of fresh ideas.

item4.question: Is Flux AI user-friendly?
item4.answer: Yes, Flux AI is designed with user experience in mind. Its intuitive interface allows users of all skill levels to navigate the tool easily. With simple input options and clear instructions, even those with minimal tech experience can start generating prompts in no time.

item5.question: Can I use Flux AI for multiple projects?
item5.answer: Absolutely! Flux AI Prompt Generator is versatile and supports a wide range of projects. Whether you're crafting blog posts, social media content, or brainstorming ideas for creative writing, you can utilize the tool multiple times to generate unique prompts for different needs.

item6.question: Is there a cost to using the Flux AI prompt word generator?
item6.answer: The Flux AI prompt word generator is currently free. Users can access the platform at any time, enter prompts and generate relevant suggestions at no cost.

description.title: Perfectly combining modern AI technology with classic Polaroid aesthetics

It's not just a filter, but deeply understands the imaging principles of Polaroid cameras, including unique color science, film grain, light leak effects, and classic white borders, providing you with the closest digital experience to a real Polaroid camera.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: All your questions about the Polaroid AI Photo Generator - we have answers ready for you

item1.question: How realistic are Polaroid AI generated photos?
item1.answer: Our AI model is trained on thousands of real Polaroid photos and can accurately reproduce the color science, film grain, border proportions, and subtle optical effects of Polaroid cameras. The generated photos are visually almost indistinguishable from real Polaroid photos, with a satisfaction rate exceeding 90%.

item2.question: How does the credit system work? [MVP Test Version]
item2.answer: This is the MVP test version - every user automatically receives 100 free test credits. Text-to-Polaroid generation consumes 5 credits, image conversion consumes 8 credits. After test credits are used up, the official version will support credit purchases. This is our testing phase to validate product features and collect user feedback.

item3.question: How long does it take to generate a Polaroid photo?
item3.answer: Typically, from submitting a request to receiving the finished photo takes only 10-15 seconds. Our AI servers are optimized to maintain stable processing speeds even during peak hours. If there's a queue, the system will display estimated wait time.

item4.question: What types of images can I upload?
item4.answer: We support JPG and PNG formats with a maximum file size of 10MB. For best results, we recommend uploading clear, well-lit photos. The system automatically optimizes image size and quality without manual adjustment needed.

item5.question: Can the generated photos be used commercially?
item5.answer: You own complete usage rights for all photos generated through Polaroid AI, including commercial use. No copyright concerns - feel free to use them for social media, print materials, marketing content, and any other applications.

item6.question: When will the MVP test version end?
item6.answer: The MVP test version is expected to last 1-2 months to collect user feedback and optimize product features. After the official launch, various credit packages will be available. Generation records during the test period will be preserved. Thank you for your participation and support!

item1.question: How does Flux AI compare to Stable Diffusion 3?
item1.answer: Flux AI offers faster generation times, higher image quality, and a more user-friendly interface compared to Stable Diffusion 3. The Flux.1 model incorporates the latest advancements in AI research.

item2.question: Is Flux AI available on GitHub or Hugging Face?
item2.answer: Yes, Flux AI is open-source and available on both GitHub and Hugging Face.

item3.question: What makes Flux AI different from other AI image generators?
item3.answer: Flux AI combines speed, quality, and ease of use. It's faster than Midjourney, more user-friendly than ComfyUI, and produces higher quality images than many competitors.

item4.question: How to use Flux AI?
item4.answer: To use Flux AI, simply visit fluxaipro.art, enter your prompt, and witness the creation of breathtaking visuals in a matter of seconds.

item5.question: What pricing plans does Flux AI offer?
item5.answer: We use points to use our services, and you can click on the price card to buy points (only one payment is required).

item6.question: How can I get support for Online?
item6.answer: You can reach out to us at support@polaroidai.pro.

schnell_faq.label: FAQ
schnell_faq.title: Frequently asked questions
schnell_faq.subtitle: Explore our comprehensive FAQ to find quick answers to common inquiries. If you need further assistance, don't hesitate to contact us for personalized help.

item1.question: What is Flux.1 Schnell?
item1.answer: Flux.1 Schnell is the fastest image generation model tailored for local development and personal use.

item2.question: How important is the initial input when generating images in Flux.1 Schnell?
item2.answer: The initial input used in Flux.1 Schnell is incredibly important for image quality. Providing high-quality and detailed inputs can lead to more realistic and detailed outputs. Ensure that the concepts and elements proposed are well-defined for the best results.

item3.question: How can I improve the quality of images generated by Flux.1 Schnell?
item3.answer: To enhance image quality, provide clear and detailed prompts, experiment with different artistic styles, and consider using the pro variant for more complex tasks.

item4.question: Are there online communities or forums that provide tips for improving Flux.1 Schnell image quality?
item4.answer: Yes, can be used on the official website at https://fluxaipro.art/flux-schnell. Users only need to input their prompts on the website and generate images, which can help you improve the quality of your generated images.

item5.question: How can I use Flux.1 Schnell and are there any free options?
item5.answer: Flux.1 Schnell can be used on the official website at https://fluxaipro.art/flux-schnell. Each user gets 5 free uses of the Flux.1 Schnell model per calendar month, which resets at the beginning of each month. To use it, simply input your prompt on the website and generate images. This process can help you improve the quality of your generated images over time.

item6.question: How can I get support for Online?
item6.answer: You can reach out to us at support@polaroidai.pro.
